name: The Caver
description: The caver is an interactive text adventure game that takes place in the land of Moji.  In this game, you will take the role of Ralph, an experienced caver and a highly respected speleologist.  Ralph goes to the land of Moji to explore the biggest cave in the land, cave Mojito. Ralph has tackled plenty of caves in his day but have never experienced anything quite like this. Experience the thrill of survival after Ralph gets caved in Mojito. Ralph now has to explore the cave, find items, and take a gamble to help aid his escape. The path to safety is unknown, as are the trails awaiting Ralph. Will Ralph make it out, or has he seen his last speck of daylight? You’ll have to roll the dice and find out.
